review.reviewBody: Good food but item said 5 A04. Peaceful Beef Rolls | 牛肉卷餅  but only received 4. Bit expensive for just four.
Beg rolls were delicious. Other dishes so-so. General Tso's chicken not as expected. Bland snd sticky

the mah-poh tofu and Shanghai noodles did not taste consistent with other Peaceful restaurant locations, which left us disappointed. We choose Peaceful restaurant because we trust that our experience will be consistent regardless of location.
ordered fried crispy tofu in salty egg yolk, but could not taste the salted egg yolk flavor at all and the dish itself was very bland.

The sweet and sour chicken, and general tso's chicken from peaceful Richmond tastes NOTHING like the dishes from the peaceful restaraunts in Vancouver. I love peaceful in Vancouver, but their Richmond location doesn't taste good and is nothing like it. They also don't have mushu noodle or cumin lamb noodle on the menu. Such a shame.
